name: Space Hair Day (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Every few seconds, gravity in this space station switches off. Things that couldn't hurt you before can now fly toward you. Thankfully, with the right jump, you can float away from danger. Be careful though - once you're off a surface, you are out of control!

As a prototype, it only has a few levels, and there is plenty that I didn't manage to add or fix. But I am pretty happy with how the hair turned out!
